job_title: Test Center Administrator in Abu Dhabi, Abu Dhabi
pros: Good environment and workload is fine
cons: Operates as a start up company

pros: The mission and vision of the company are very admirable.
cons:
- Very limited for growth.
- Salaries are very low.
- Job stagnation.
- Overworked.
- Limited 21st-century vision.
- Very hierarchical and power is lies only at the top.
To many. No appreciation for hard work being the main one.
